abstract.p: Correction of October 24 report in Technology Briefings column in Business Day on opening of HotWire.com, online airline ticket service

block.p: A report in the Technology Briefing column of Business Day last Tuesday about the opening of Hotwire.com, an online airline ticket service, misstated the practices of Priceline.com, a competitor. Its users propose a price they are willing to pay for tickets and must buy them if Priceline can match that price. Priceline does not require users to bid for seats and accept the lowest fare offered.
